name: SwapRouter
description: Uniswap V3 Swap Router. Router for stateless execution of swaps against Uniswap V3.

functionDecorators.name: exactInput
functionDecorators.description: Swaps `amountIn` of one token for as much as possible of another along the specified path.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The parameters necessary for the multi-hop swap, encoded as `ExactInputParams` in calldata.

returnDecorators.name: amountOut
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the received token.

functionDecorators.name: exactInputSingle
functionDecorators.description: Swaps `amountIn` of one token for as much as possible of another token.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The parameters necessary for the swap, encoded as `ExactInputSingleParams` in calldata.

returnDecorators.name: amountOut
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the received token.

functionDecorators.name: exactOutput
functionDecorators.description: Swaps as little as possible of one token for `amountOut` of another along the specified path (reversed).

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The parameters necessary for the multi-hop swap, encoded as `ExactOutputParams` in calldata.

returnDecorators.name: amountIn
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the input token.

functionDecorators.name: exactOutputSingle
functionDecorators.description: Swaps as little as possible of one token for `amountOut` of another token.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: The parameters necessary for the swap, encoded as `ExactOutputSingleParams` in calldata.

returnDecorators.name: amountIn
returnDecorators.description: The amount of the input token.

functionDecorators.name: multicall
functionDecorators.description: Call multiple functions in the current contract and return the data from all of them if they all succeed. The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from multicall.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: The encoded function data for each of the calls to make to this contract.

returnDecorators.name: results
returnDecorators.description: The results from each of the calls passed in via data.

functionDecorators.name: refundETH
functionDecorators.description: Refunds any ETH balance held by this contract to the `msg.sender`. Useful for bundling with mint or increase liquidity that uses ether, or exact output swaps that use ether for the input amount.

functionDecorators.name: selfPermit
functionDecorators.description: Permits this contract to spend a given token from `msg.sender`. The `owner` is always msg.sender and the `spender` is always address(this).

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token spent.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount that can be spent of token.

parameterDecorators.name: deadline
parameterDecorators.description: A timestamp, the current blocktime must be less than or equal to this timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `v` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `v`.

functionDecorators.name: selfPermitAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Permits this contract to spend the sender's tokens for permit signatures that have the `allowed` parameter. The `owner` is always msg.sender and the `spender` is always address(this).

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token spent.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The current nonce of the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: expiry
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp at which the permit is no longer valid.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `v` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `v`.

functionDecorators.name: selfPermitAllowedIfNecessary
functionDecorators.description: Permits this contract to spend the sender's tokens for permit signatures that have the `allowed` parameter. The `owner` is always msg.sender and the `spender` is always address(this) Can be used instead of #selfPermitAllowed to prevent calls from failing due to a frontrun of a call to #selfPermitAllowed.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token spent.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The current nonce of the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: expiry
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp at which the permit is no longer valid.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `v` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `v`.

functionDecorators.name: selfPermitIfNecessary
functionDecorators.description: Permits this contract to spend a given token from `msg.sender`. The `owner` is always msg.sender and the `spender` is always address(this). Can be used instead of #selfPermit to prevent calls from failing due to a frontrun of a call to #selfPermit.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token spent.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount that can be spent of token.

parameterDecorators.name: deadline
parameterDecorators.description: A timestamp, the current blocktime must be less than or equal to this timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `v` and `s`.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Must produce valid secp256k1 signature from the holder along with `r` and `v`.

functionDecorators.name: sweepToken
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the full amount of a token held by this contract to recipient. The amountMinimum parameter prevents malicious contracts from stealing the token from users.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of the token which will be transferred to `recipient`.

parameterDecorators.name: amountMinimum
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum amount of token required for a transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The destination address of the token.

functionDecorators.name: sweepTokenWithFee
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the full amount of a token held by this contract to recipient, with a percentage between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive) going to feeRecipient. The amountMinimum parameter prevents malicious contracts from stealing the token from users.

functionDecorators.name: uniswapV3SwapCallback
functionDecorators.description: Called to `msg.sender` after executing a swap via IUniswapV3Pool#swap. In the implementation you must pay the pool tokens owed for the swap. The caller of this method must be checked to be a UniswapV3Pool deployed by the canonical UniswapV3Factory. amount0Delta and amount1Delta can both be 0 if no tokens were swapped.

parameterDecorators.name: amount0Delta
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of token0 that was sent (negative) or must be received (positive) by the pool by the end of the swap. If positive, the callback must send that amount of token0 to the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: amount1Delta
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of token1 that was sent (negative) or must be received (positive) by the pool by the end of the swap. If positive, the callback must send that amount of token1 to the pool.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Any data passed through by the caller via the IUniswapV3PoolActions#swap call.

functionDecorators.name: unwrapWETH9
functionDecorators.description: Unwraps the contract's WETH9 balance and sends it to recipient as ETH. The amountMinimum parameter prevents malicious contracts from stealing WETH9 from users.

parameterDecorators.name: amountMinimum
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum amount of WETH9 to unwrap.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: The address receiving ETH.

functionDecorators.name: unwrapWETH9WithFee
functionDecorators.description: Unwraps the contract's WETH9 balance and sends it to recipient as ETH, with a percentage between 0 (exclusive), and 1 (inclusive) going to feeRecipient. The amountMinimum parameter prevents malicious contracts from stealing WETH9 from users.
